p: Essential oils hydrodistillated from the different organs of L. camara growing in Bregbo were analyzed using gas chromatography equipped with a flame ionization detector (GC-FID), gas chromatography-mass spectrometry (GC-MS), and the 13C NMR method, as described by Boué et al. (2018) and Kambiré et al. (2019) [ 77, 78].
